main event: On January 21, 1952, a Navy pilot sighted a large, bright, metallic, disc-shaped object while flying near Mitchell AFB, NY.
interesting points: The object hovered for 30 seconds before making an abrupt right angle turn and accelerating at an extreme speed., The object was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter., The entire sighting lasted about 1 minute., The pilot's description noted that the object's maneuvers were inconsistent with those of a balloon., Multiple witnesses, including pilots from F-94 aircraft, observed the object maneuvering at high speeds.
location: Mitchell AFB, Kings County, United States
witness description: Navy pilot and F-94 aircraft pilots
